goal.ch: 課程目標為以釐清統計基礎觀念及其理論為出發點，從不同角度切入貝氏統計的觀點與技巧，並將統計計算方法應用在貝氏分析中。
goal.en:
The objective of the course is to explore the 
thinking of fundamental concepts and 
development of statistical theory and learning the Bayesian methods for solving 
problems from a different point of view.  Modern 
computational skills will be emphasized to 
implement the Bayesian methodology.

outline.ch:
1. Introduction
2. Motivation for Bayesian Analysis
3. Bayesian Inference
4. Empirical and Hierarchical Bayesian Approaches
5. Computation and Applications
6. Model Criticism and Selection
outline.en:
1. Introduction
2. Motivation for Bayesian Analysis
3. Bayesian Inference
4. Empirical and Hierarchical Bayesian Approaches
5. Computation and Applications
6. Model Criticism and Selection

textbook.ch:
Text Books:  
1. Bayesian Methods for Data Analysis (3rd Ed.) by B. Carlin and T. Louis 
     (2008). Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC.
2.  Statistical Decision Theory and Bayesian Analysis (2nd Ed.) by J. O. Berger 
     (1985). Springer-Verlag,  New York.

Reference Books:
Text Books:  
1. Bayesian Methods for Data Analysis (3rd Ed.) by B. Carlin and T. Louis 
     (2008). Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC.
2.  Statistical Decision Theory and Bayesian Analysis (2nd Ed.) by J. O. Berger 
     (1985). Springer-Verlag,  New York.

Reference Books:
1. Bayesian Data Analysis (3rd Ed.) by A. Gelman, et al. (2013). Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC.
2. Ntzoufras, I. (2009). {\it Bayesian Modeling with WinBUGS}. Wiley.
3. Spiegelhalter, D.,  Thomas, A., Best, N. and Lunn, D. (2014). OpenBUGS User Manual (version 3.2.3)}.  http://www.mrc-bsu.cam.ac.uk/bugs
4. Bayesian Computation with R (2nd Edition) by J. Albert (2009). Springer-Verlag, New York.
5. Robert, C. (2001). The Bayesian Choice (2nd Ed.)}.   Springer-Verlag, New York.
textbook.en:
Text Books:  
1. Bayesian Methods for Data Analysis (3rd Ed.) by B. Carlin and T. Louis 
     (2008). Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC.
2.  Statistical Decision Theory and Bayesian Analysis (2nd Ed.) by J. O. Berger

Reference Books:
1. Bayesian Data Analysis (3rd Ed.) by A. Gelman, et al. (2013). Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC.
2. Ntzoufras, I. (2009). {\it Bayesian Modeling with WinBUGS}. Wiley.
3. Spiegelhalter, D.,  Thomas, A., Best, N. and Lunn, D. (2014). OpenBUGS User Manual (version 3.2.3)}.  http://www.mrc-bsu.cam.ac.uk/bugs

5. Robert, C. (2001). The Bayesian Choice (2nd Ed.)}.   Springer-Verlag, New York.

gradMethod.en:
1. Homework                         40％
2. Midterm Exam                   30％
3. Final Report (or Exam)      30％

ch: 指定課程:必須先修ST6021、先修ST6038。且檢定指定課程平均成績達70分以上。
en: Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementST6021、Prerequisite Course RequirementST6038 only.With an average of 70 or above for Required Subjects.
